keyMappings:
unmapAll

map j scrollDown
map J scrollRight
map k scrollUp
map K scrollLeft

map gg scrollToTop
map G scrollToBottom

map d scrollPageDown
map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map u scrollPageUp
map <c-u> scrollPageUp

map r reload
map R reload hard

map yy copyCurrentUrl

map p openCopiedUrlInCurrentTab
map P openCopiedUrlInNewTab

map i enterInsertMode

map v enterVisualMode
map V enterVisualLineMode

map I passNextKey

map gi focusInput
map gn goNext
map gp goPrevious
map gr goToRoot
map gu goUp

map f  LinkHints.activateMode
map F  LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map tf LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewTab
map q  LinkHints.activateModeWithQueue

map Wf LinkHints.activateModeToOpenIncognito

map ;d LinkHints.activateModeToDownloadLink
map ;y LinkHints.activateModeToCopyLinkUrl

map o  Vomnibar.activate
map O  Vomnibar.activateInNewTab

map b  Vomnibar.activateBookmarks
map B  Vomnibar.activateBookmarksInNewTab

map S Vomnibar.activateTabSelection

map e Vomnibar.activateEditUrl
map E Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

map / enterFindMode

map n performFind
map N performBackwardsFind

map * findSelected
map # findSelectedBackwards

map H goBack
map L goForward

map tt createTab
map ww createTab window
map WW createTab incognito
map Ww createTab incognito

map h previousTab
map l nextTab

map s visitPreviousTab

map td duplicateTab

map x removeTab
map X restoreTab

map tg moveTabToNewWindow

map ch closeTabsOnLeft
map cl closeTabsOnRight
map co closeOtherTabs

map <c-h> moveTabLeft
map <c-l> moveTabRight

map + zoomIn
map - zoomOut
map = zoomReset

map ? showHelp
searchEngines:
ap: https://archlinux.org/packages/?q=%s Arch Packages
au: https://aur.archlinux.org/packages?K=%s AUR Packages
aw: https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php?search=%s Arch Wiki
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
di: https://duckduckgo.com/?iar=images&q=%s DuckDuckGo Images
ew: https://eldenring.fandom.com/wiki/Special:Search?query=%s Elden Ring Wiki
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
gi: https://images.google.com/search?q=%s Google Images
h: https://hello.atlassian.net/wiki/search?text=%s Hello Search
hi: https://hello.atlassian.net/browse/%s Hello Issue
n: https://github.com/nvim-tree/nvim-tree.lua/issues/%s nvim-tree Issue
o: http://go.atlassian.com/%s Go
pd: https://www.protondb.com/search?q=%s Proton DB
sd: https://steamdb.info/instantsearch/?query=%s Steam DB
ss: https://store.steampowered.com/search/?term=%s Steam Store
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
